knimeNode.name: Sigma Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies sigma filtering to the input images.

fullDescription.intro: Applies sigma filtering to the input images assuming normally distributed noise.

tab.name: options
tab.option: The Window Span parameter determines the span of the window in one direction. The resulting window size is given by: span*2+1 in each dimension.
Factor to scale sigma. It modifies the size of the interval.
The minimum fraction of pixels which have to be in range. Otherwise the mean of all values inside the window is calculated.
Extends the option "Pixel Fraction" by leaving out the center pixel if the fraction of pixels is below the minimum.
